ComicInfo.Title: The Prize Figthers; Child's Play; Not On My Watch!; The Lame Master; The Pep Talk; Room to Improve; Gary, Gary, Quite Contrary
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Prize Figthers: The Knights win the Hackmaster tournament but are not happy with the prize.
Child's Play: The Knights are almost out of the tournament until the realize how Timmy is running the game and adjust their gameplay.
Not On My Watch!: The Blank Hands don't make a good impression on their gamemaster and our out of the Hackmaster tournament.
The Lame Master: The Knights discover that their gamemaster for the next round of the tournament will be Timmy Jackson.
The Pep Talk: Nitro gives his group a pep talk before their next match.
Room to Improve: Sara tries to convince the rest of the group that their gameplay needs to be improved but they don't see it the same way.
Gary, Gary, Quite Contrary: Weird Pete believes that Gary Jackson is coming to the gaming convention but instead he is getting Timmy Jackson.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:15:49. [CVDB190744] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:56:18. [Issue ID 89660]
ComicInfo.Writer: David Day,David S. Kenzer,Jolly Roger Blackburn
ComicInfo.Characters: Sara Felton,Newt Forager,Pete Ashton,Bob Herzog,Dave Bozwell,Brian van Hoose,Troy Quincy Watson,Nitro Fergueson,Boris Alphonzo,Earl Slackmozer,Jo Jo Zeke,Timmy Jackson,Gordon Sheckberry,Stevil Van Hostle
ComicInfo.Teams: The Knights of the Dinner Table,Black Hand Gaming Society
